summary: This mod adds a chest in dragons reach 2nd floor that has a some items I made i hope you like them.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a chest in dragons reach 2nd floor that has a some items I made i hope you like them. This is a overpowered mod. I have made another mod like this with more balanced items it is called \"Chest of Holding Stuff (Balanced Items)\" that mod is only on the steam workshop. hope you like it. And one last thing give thanks for the true long bow to funtoscrap he allowed me to put the bow in my mod. 

Have fun, kill some dragons, and good luck. 

New update the ring of the lizard now makes you invisible also but will not keep you invisible when you activate or attack you will then have to unequip and reequip the ring to become invisible hope you like it.
author: ThePieGuy731
